trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for installed and private font collections.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para coleções de tipo de letra instalado e privadas.

trans-unit.source: The FontCollection allows you to get a list of the font families contained in the collection with its <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Families%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O FontCollection permite-lhe obter uma lista das famílias de tipo de letra contido na coleção com o respetivo <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Families%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Families%2A>

trans-unit.source: For additional information on fonts and text, including example code, see [Using Fonts and Text](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre tipos de letra e o texto, incluindo o código de exemplo, consulte [utilizando tipos de letra e texto](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>foi occupying.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> </xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose()`método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>referências.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the array of <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> objetos associados a este <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um objeto para tentar libertar recursos e efetuar outras operações de limpeza antes de que reclamada a através da recolha de lixo.
